  html_document:
    toc: true
---

```{r, eval = FALSE}
fitted <- keyATM_run(texts = quanteda_dfm,
                     iteration=1000,
                     extra_k=3,
                     keywords=keywords_list,
                     mode="basic",
                     options=list(seed=225))
post <- keyATM_posterior(fitted)
```

To visualize keywords,
```{r, eval=FALSE}
fitted$visualize_keywords
```

If you just want to check the visualization,
```{r, eval = FALSE}
model <- keyATM_run(texts = quanteda_dfm,
                    iteration=0,
                    extra_k=3,
                    keywords=keywords_list,
                    mode="basic",
                    options=list(seed=225))
model$visualize_keywords
```
